title: Did Trump golf, hold the Rally after learning about CAVID-19 threat?
subtitle: After Mr. Mitch McConnell suggested that the government's response to the outbreak of the first chrona virus was partially distracted by the President's accusation that he was not a victim.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: American President Donald Trump played golf several times and held a number of gatherings after he learned about the threat of the Corona virus.
